The diagraph data structure.text: There is a definition of diagraph. There are things that make good diagraph. There are different methods of making diagraph. There are implementations of the diagraph data structure.

Definition of diagraph.text: Diagraph is a graph data structure. Traversals of diagraph are valid prose explanations. A diagraph is composed of a global namespace of topics. Each topic contains a local namespace of subtopic names. One subtopic of the topic matches the topic.

Methods of making diagraph.text: There are different methods for making diagraph. You can use the canopy bulk mode for example.

Canopy bulk mode.text: The canopy bulk mode is a CLI tool for making diagraph.

Implementations of the diagraph data str.text: Of which, the Canopy project is one.
